verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — President Donald Trump , still nursing resentment against [ARG0: Attorney General Jeff Sessions] for [V: recusing] [ARG1: himself] [ARG2: from the Russia investigation] , says he wishes he 'd picked a different leader of the Justice Department .
